trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Asocia actividades en una correlación representando un determinado objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> compartido o contexto transitorio en el flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/includes/wf-md.md)] proporciona cuatro tipos de correlación: [según contenido](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [solicitud-respuesta](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [dúplex duradero](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), y [intercambio de contexto](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlación, vea [información general de correlación](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), los tipos de correlación concreto se ha mencionado anteriormente, y las muestras de correlación se encuentran en la [servicios [ejemplos de WF] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) nodo de la [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] ejemplos.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: El runtime usa el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> para la correlación si está presente; de lo contrario, el **CorrelatesWith** se usará la propiedad de la actividad de mensajería.

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Si están presentes ambos, se usa el identificador ambiente que proporciona <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> o el servicio de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo establecer el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> en la actividad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Registra la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> con el tiempo de ejecución de flujo de trabajo.
El entorno de inicialización de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Anula el registro de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> con el tiempo de ejecución de flujo de trabajo.
